title: White Ruff
description: A classic children's story about a wonderful dog and his adventures.“They're holding White Ruff for ransom,” Chet's father said. “They want a thousand dollars.”Meanwhile the big collie awoke. Noise drummed against his ears, the roar of a motor and the rumble of rolling wheels. Suddenly there was a screeching sound! The box containing Ruff went flying through the air, crashed and rolled over and over. Ruff jumped clear of the blazing gasoline. He was free!But where was he? Where were Chet and his father? How could he get home?
author: Glenn Balch
